details.arabic_diacless: وافوض امري الى اللٰهؕ ان اللٰه بصيرۢ بالعباد‏
details.arabic: وَاُفَوِّضُ اَمۡرِيْٓ اِلَى اللّٰهِؕ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ بَصِيۡرٌۢ بِالۡعِبَادِ‏
details.transliteration: waofawwidu amree ila Allahi inna Allahabaseerun bilAAibad
details.translations: and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants."
